attributes.action: instruct the Home Secretary to order the immediate release from prison of Munir and Tokeer Hussain,and to replace them with Walid Salem and Judge John Reddihough.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hard-working,tax-paying citizens Munir Hussain and his brother Tokeer were given long jail sentences for apprehending and injuring a prolific burglar following an horrific attempted robbery at their family home. The burglar,with over 50 previous convictions,walked free from Court. To help restore a modicum of faith in the British judicial system,we call upon the Government to order the immediate release of the Hussain brothers and to replace them in jail with Walid Salem (the multiple repeat offender who is currently free to attack again) and John Reddihough (the treacherous Judge who turned his back on the British public and gave violent criminals the green light to carry on offending).

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
